ComicInfo.Penciller: Chris Mooneyham,Daniel Sampere,Francis Manapul,Meghan Hetrick,Mirka Andolfo,Rafael Albuquerque,Travis Moore,Francis Manapul,Mirka Andolfo,Chris Mooneyham,Meghan Hetrick,Daniel Sampere,Rafael Albuquerque,Travis Moore
ComicInfo.Series: Dark Nights: Death Metal The Last Stories of the DC Universe
ComicInfo.Summary:
Man of Tomorrow: On the eve of the final battle, Superman uses a time travel device to travel back in time one hour over and over so that he can be everywhere at once providing hope for the world.
We Fight For Love: On the eve of the final battle, Batman prepares his team, while Dick wants to discuss his true feelings with Barbara.
Whale Fall: Aquaman reflects on his actions during the Death Metal crisis that led to him collaborating with the forces of the Batman Who Laughs.
Dust of a Distant Storm: On the eve of the final battle, Ollie and Dinah spend some time together contemplating their lives and are surprised to encounter a refugee from the Multiverse with a surprising connection to them.
The Question: Wonder Woman struggles with how to prepare for the final battle to save the Multiverse, and receives inspiration from an unexpected source.
Last Knights: On the eve of the final battle, Hal Jordan seeks solitude, but ends up having a surprising encounter with Sinestro.
Together: On the eve of the final battle for the fate of the Multiverse, pretty much everyone who has ever been a Titan gathers together. Things get tense when Wally appears as he was responsible for Roy's death, but Donna offers forgiveness and then gives an inspirational speech that gives the heroes hope.
